title: Environmental Impacts of Fossil Fuel Extraction

content.question: Which of the following best describes a potential negative environmental effect of fossil fuel extraction?

choices.label: Fossil fuel extraction requires new infrastructure and has a high start-up cost.
Birds are injured or killed when they fly around extraction sites.
Thermal energy produced during the extraction process is released into nearby streams and lakes.
Air pollutants, such as methane and particulate matter, are emitted into the atmosphere.

content.answer: Air pollutants, such as methane and particulate matter, are emitted into the atmosphere.
